title: Under Armour Men's Rocket 2 Cross-Trainer Shoe
feature: You're ready for a spur-of-the-moment game in the Under Armour® UA Rocket 2 basketball shoe.
Lightweight synthetic leather and textile upper materials.
Perforations along the side panels for enhanced breathability.

Wrap-around collar and burrito tongue promote a snug, secure fit. Padded tongue and collar. Smooth fabric lining offers a great in-shoe feel. Micro G® sockliner molds to the foot for a great fit and feel. Micro G midsole provides impact absorption and dynamic energy return. One-piece solid rubber outsole features a herringbone traction patter for unmatched traction and control. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 15 oz Product measurements were taken using size 11, width D - M
description: Lightweight leather upper provides flexible structure .Molded foam wrap-around ankle collar for a snug, extended fit that increases comfort & support .“Burrito tongue" construction delivers a bootie-like fit that wraps the foot for precise fit & foot guidance .Engineered perforations surround the foot for improved breathability & ventilation .Oversized UA license plate logo .Full-length molded Micro Gsockliner molds to your foot .Micro Gfoam midsole turns cushioned landings into explosive takeoffs .One-piece solid rubber outsole with herringbone traction pattern throughout to provide exceptional on-court traction & control .Weight: 15 oz. .
